entry.title: SMOG WARNING , Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.7°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
